name: WSS: Zero
description:
WSS: Zero

In WSS: Zero, you play as an agent who’ve been sent to an asteroid to wipe the information related to the WSS project, but… Why?

Short thrilling prequel of the game Waifu's Spooky Space Station.

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Camera movement
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Pause
